articles.description: Is Miley Cyrus' "Flowers" about her ex-husband Liam Hemsworth? Read on for all the Easter eggs fans believe the singer dropped in her new breakup song.
articles.content:
Furthermore, fans believe that Miley gives a nod to her and Liam's once-shared Malibu home, which burned down in a California wildfire shortly before their wedding, in the song's first verse.

articles.title: Bella Hadid as Marilyn Monroe! The model wears a blonde wig - Daily Mail
articles.description: The younger sister of model Gigi Hadid wore a fun white blonde wig with flirty little curls all around her face to resemble Some Like It Hot actress Marilyn Monroe.
articles.content:
Bella Hadid tried on a classic Hollywood movie star look this week.
